title: Auto-merge social media PRs (Discord, Instagram, highlights, README)
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Automates the merging process for routine social media content PRs including Instagram and GitHub updates.
gist.impact: Streamlines the content publishing workflow by removing manual review steps for standard updates.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot watching a conveyor belt of pixelated envelopes being automatically stamped by a cute robot arm. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel lavender background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Emotionally warm, efficient but cozy.
